roleset.name: having been for a long time
roleset.note: LONGSTANDING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. Relation to stand.01. (from longstanding.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Mrs. Duran likely has anemia of chronic kidney disease , but she does have a macrocytosis which-1 *PRO*-1 is longstanding .
